system.description:
Nature's Acolyte: You gain +1 Nature

Vicious: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.LQk7PrEpYsFvGbD6]{Vicious Bite}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Cunning: You gain +1 Lore.

Stone Sense. You have tremorsense to a range of 15 feet. You can sense any creature that is touching the ground, even if it is invisible or you are blinded. You cannot make out any details about their appearance other than their general size.

Naturally Stealthy: You gain +1 Scoundrel

Feline Agility: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.FbZp3GjR8jhhB6di]{Cat Dash}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Draconic Resilience: You gain +20% Air Resistance.

Dragon's Breath: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.nAh8uTmIbhyblDoT]{Lightning Breath}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Draconic Resilience: You gain +20% Poison Resistance.

Dragon's Breath: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.sk3TRdHVRDxJKhsn]{Toxic Breath}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Naturally Stealthy: You gain +1 Scoundrel

Nimble: Your movement doesn't provoke @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.sMOJLlVWBNuVXzXt]{Opportunity Attacks} and your attacks don't provoke @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.TTSollRswbZwxvie]{Counterattacks}.

Cunning: You gain +1 Lore

Fade Away: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.tSD1zBDz3Dd1JHOa]{Blend In}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Shamanistic: You gain +1 Religion

Powerful: You can lift, drag, and pull as though your size category was one larger.

Brutal: You gain +5% Critical Chance and +10% Critical Damage Bonus

Amenable: You gain +1 Influence

Inspiring: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.QGcR9go3OLB6ZlFd]{Inspire}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Nature's Acolyte: You gain +1 Nature.

Aerial: You permanently have @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.LLH4JH8ymefXRf9R]{Flying}.

Draconic Resilience: You gain +20% Psychic Resistance.

Dragon's Breath: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.1iI5m8N56wMHOuTA]{Psychic Breath}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Nature's Acolyte: You gain +1 Nature.

Draconic Roar: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.APfg9SITPp2oaCIf]{Thunderous Roar}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Fiendish Resilience: You gain +20% Fire resistance.

Alacrity: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.9qriGN36RzE67jGc]{Haste}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Amenable: You gain +1 Influence

Semicorporeal: Your movement doesn't provoke @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.sMOJLlVWBNuVXzXt]{Opportunity Attacks} and your attacks don't provoke @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.TTSollRswbZwxvie]{Counterattacks}.

Inorganic: Normal healing has no effect on you, but you heal from air damage and are immune to @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.Y7nT6W1vQGzOCVwm]{Shocked}.

Nature's Acolyte: You gain +1 Nature

Amphibious: You can breath both air and water and swimming in water doesn't impede your movement as long as you aren't wearing heavy armor.

Gift of the Ocean: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.F0YJvRv7Aqow2Krx]{Water Breathing}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Shamanistic: You gain +1 Religion

Powerful: You can lift, drag, and pull as though your size category was one larger.

Minotaur… Form…: You permanently gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.Zlj1EvcmmNRoU37t]{Minotaur Form}

Draconic Resilience: You gain +20% Water Resistance.

Dragon's Breath: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.b8PPH887zYlKbt4p]{Ice Breath}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Nature's Acolyte: You gain +1 Nature.

Sylvan Mind: You gain +3 Mind.

Naturally Stealthy: You gain +1 Scoundrel

Inspiring: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.QGcR9go3OLB6ZlFd]{Inspire}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.
